title: Bobby Threw a Surprise Birthday for His Wife and Offers Tips + How A Listener Saved Amy’s Life + Bobby Scratches A Lottery Ticket That Was A Christmas Gift  and WINS Money!
itunes:title: Bobby Threw a Surprise Birthday for His Wife and Offers Tips + How A Listener Saved Amy’s Life + Bobby Scratches A Lottery Ticket That Was A Christmas Gift  and WINS Money!
description:
Bobby reveals he threw a surprise birthday party for his wife last night. He gives tips on how to throw a surprise party for someone who is hard to surprise. Amy shares a story how a listener got her attention online in an attempt to save her life. Bobby scratches a lotto ticket that he got for Christmas and we can’t believe how much money he won!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
